channel.title: Optical Networking on FEEC/UNICAMP IA382 - Seminar in Computer Engineering
channel.description: Recent content in Optical Networking on FEEC/UNICAMP IA382 - Seminar in Computer Engineering

item.title: Challenges in Deploying a High-Performance SDN Network to Support the World’s Largest Optical Telescope
item.description: Abstract # The Vera Rubin Observatory, the world’s largest optical telescope, presents a set of operational requirements that have created numerous challenges across all involved domains—from architecture to logistics, from materials to computer networks.

item.title: A Bioengineering View on Optical Network Openness and Automation
item.description: Abstract # This talk will first review trends in optical networking and SDN.
